page.title: 18FACILITIES OF ST.STEPHENS
page.content: The curriculum embraces English, Mathematics, Computing, Geography, History, Science, Cookery, Craft, Religious Education, Sports, Athletics and Drama. There are project work, daytrips, weekend visits and longer outings. The school has an outdoor swimming pool, a large library, An Acorn computer with disc-drive, a laboratory, workshop and Home Economics room. There is a small unit for partially-sighted children. Provision is made for learning some musical instruments. Friends of St. Stephen(FOSSS) is a thriving association of parents, teachers and others contributing to the life and resources of the school. There are ten clubs run during lunchtime or after school.
